revised_title: Successful Treatment of a Large Ovarian Tumor through Surgical Incision
tldr: A 58-year-old woman was suffering from a large ovarian tumor causing her immense pain and difficulty breathing. Dr. Robert Houstoun performed a large incision on her abdomen, removing the tumor and relieving the patient's symptoms. The woman recovered and regained her strength, highlighting the importance of skilled medical intervention in treating such conditions.
